features.title: adding ability to quickly enable and disable API on device only
Enable / Disable API on Blockstack syncing devices
Adding API Archives to ensure no posts get lost
Improved API notification and log capturing
Adding progress bar to compare loading
Charts will now respect the Ignore Zero flag
Visual swiping between dashboards and tracker tabs
Improved popmenu experience across entire app
Support for importing tracker bundles (coming to the website soon)
Long press to auto save tracker default, start/stop timers
Track and check-in from the dashboard
